name: Danny Thompson
tweet:
REASONS TO GET OUT OF YOUR COMFORT ZONE AND NETWORK/ASK FOR OPPORTUNITIES!

üßµThreadüßµ

How many opportunities have you lost simply because you didn't open your mouth?
How many times have you denied yourself a better position just because you didn't vocalize your interest?

name: Danny Thompson
tweet: The richest people in the world build mutually beneficial connections and networks. Others look for "who is going to help me!" And offers nothing back. Are you making connections that are mutually beneficial? What are YOU bringing to the table?

name: Danny Thompson
tweet:
When trying to get an opportunity in a new industry, it is intimidating to speak with people you don't know and to get jobs you have no experience with.

One thing you have to understand. If you reach out and they say NO. You will LITERALLY NEVER SEE THEM. So why not say hey?

name: Danny Thompson
tweet:
They will never come to your house or your job. So why not send a message/email and see what happens?

There is no way they can say YES if they don't know that you exist.

A successful network will keep you employed. Networks produce opportunities.

name: Danny Thompson
tweet:
A strong network can produce job opportunities without you having to apply to them.
Not only that, a strong network can produce financial opportunities!

Example, a conference I am putting on, we needed sponsorship. Raised $1000 in less than 2 hours.
That is what a network can do

name: Danny Thompson
tweet:
"Hey I saw that you posted about XYZ here are three reasons why you and I should have a conversation.
A.
B.
C."

"Oh that is interesting! We should set up a call."

Bam! Just made it into interview 1.

name: Danny Thompson
tweet:
Being a valuable connection isn't just "WHAT CAN YOU DO FOR ME?"

BUT!!!! 
What is beneficial for BOTH parties.

Many times I have networked with others and helped them out by introducing them to people they need. They will never forget you and you helped someone!

name: Danny Thompson
tweet: Know where you want to go and make sure people in that industry know about it.üôèüèΩ‚ù§Ô∏è
